Managers¶

class bhp_registration.managers.RegisteredSubjectManager¶

Bases: django.db.models.manager.Manager

update_with(instance, attrname='subject_identifier', **kwargs)¶

Use an instance, usually a consent, to update registered subject.

Assume all required fields attributes are included in the instance. Additional fields may be passed as kwargs.

To avoid creating a new registered subject record/instance for a subject that already exists, access the registered_subject attribute on ‘instance’, if it exists and is not null. Otherwise, create an new registered_subject

It is the responsibility of the calling model (usually a consent) to help with instance.registered_subject.
